title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.

title: TVLine Items: Super Bowl to Stream Free on Tubi, Richard Jenkins Joins DTF St. Louis and More
description: Looking for a way to watch this year’s Super Bowl for free? Tubi has you covered. (But you still have to pay for chips and soda.) title: The Way Home Stars Talk ’70s Timeline and Its Unconventional Love Triangle — Watch Video
description: With its second episode, The Way Home Season 3 introduced a new love triangle in 1974 between young Colton Landry, his best friend Evelyn Goodwin (!) and new-to-Port Haven Delilah Watson.
